channel.title: Two little questions
channel.description: Ok so. 1.) How can you make a npc face a different direction instead of all npcs facing south. 2.) How can you make it so your character doesn't do the same stance as it's last weapon... ex. You wear a granite maul in it's proper animation form then you switch weapons. but instead of that weapon wearing it's animation it just stays like a granite maul animation.

item.title: Two little questions
item.dc:creator: @mrtms mrtms
item.description:
@mrtms wrote:

	if (newNPC.npcType == 1) {
		if ((newNPC.absX == 3200) && (newNPC.absY == 3200)) {
			newNPC.TurnNpcTo(newNPC.absX +1, newNPC.absY);
		}
	}

100% credits to the owner of DeathzScape!

Read full topic

item.title: Two little questions
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

For first one, you can’t change that, its set like that.
You can make all npcs face only one directorn, but then itll fuck up everything, everything is defualted to face south.
You can make npcs follow you or talk to you and face you

Read full topic

item.description:

Ok so.
1.) How can you make a npc face a different direction instead of all npcs facing south.
2.) How can you make it so your character doesn’t do the same stance as it’s last weapon…
ex. You wear a granite maul in it’s proper animation form then you switch weapons. but instead of that weapon wearing it’s animation it just stays like a granite maul animation.
